name: Veasna: Incarnation
description:
Veasna is a top-down interactive game where you play as Veasna, a kid who has a frosty relationship with his mother. One day he woke up in his room and noticed something strange was happening. He decided to find out what happened to find the answer.

ControlsInputMovementArrow KeysInteractZ RolesNameGame Designer & Game ArtistYodhasu
Game Designer & Sound ArtistArkannabil PratamaSound ArtistIndraGame Designer & Game ProgrammerDerian Ardenichson
